name: Jakob Programs
tagline: Many useful and useless programs/games! Notice: I just started programming, and my skills (and the programs) will improve over time!
body:
###About the Website
Hello, and welcome to Jakob Programs, a page made for programs that are mostly for entertainment, but sometimes can be useful too! Please be aware that I am working on my coding skills in C#, and never before have learned a programming language, so please go easy on my first programs. But I promise you that I will work on them every single day and improve! Every program will get better, and once I finish C# I can learn more languages! So please-
###ENJOY!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
